body.description: Product Description Similac Alimentum Infant Formula with 2’-FL HMO is the first and only hypoallergenic infant formula with 2’-FL HMO, a unique immune-nourishing ingredient. It starts reducing colic symptoms due to protein sensitivity in most babies within 24 hours,* so your baby can start feeling better today. * Based on a clinical study with Similac Alimentum Ready to Feed without DHA, ARA, 2’-FL HMO, lutein, and beta carotene in a small group of infants experiencing colic symptoms due to cow’s milk protein sensitivity. Data on File, Study AC84, August 2004. Abbott Nutrition, Columbus, Ohio. Brand Story By Similac

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Support for Baby’s Immune System Similac Alimentum with 2’-FL human milk oligosaccharide* (HMO) is complete nutrition designed to support your baby’s immune system. 2’-FL HMO is an immune-nourishing prebiotic like that found in breast milk. It is backed by more than 20 years of research. * Not from human milk.

Start Feeling Better Today* Similac Alimentum starts reducing colic symptoms due to protein sensitivity within 24 hours in most infants.* * Based on a clinical study with Similac Alimentum Ready to Feed without DHA, ARA, 2’-FL HMO, lutein, and beta carotene in a small group of infants experiencing colic symptoms due to cow’s milk protein sensitivity. Data on File, Study AC84, August 2004. Abbott Nutrition, Columbus, Ohio. Hypoallergenic and Is Suitable for Lactose Sensitivity Similac Alimentum has protein that is broken down into tiny pieces to virtually eliminate allergic reactions in most babies who are allergic to cow’s milk protein. It is suitable for lactose sensitivity and has DHA and ARA, special nutrients found in breast milk that are important to help support brain and eye development. Quality of Sleep After initiation of Alimentum, 62% of parents reported good to excellent quality of infant sleep vs 10% before initiation.* * Data on file. Similac Alimentum without 2’-FL HMO, lutein and beta carotene 2018. MySimilac Rewards With MySimilac Rewards, get nutrition guidance for you and baby, exclusive benefits, coupons, and much more.

Similac Alimentum Similac Pro-Sensitive Similac Pro-Total Comfort Similac Soy Isomil Suitable for Lactose Sensitvity ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic for Cow's Milk Protein Allergy ✓ Has 2'-FL HMO for Immune Support ✓ ✓ ✓ Complete Nutrition for Sensitive Tummies ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Partially Hydrolyzed Whey Protein for Easy Digestion ✓ Soy-based Protein ✓ Not for infants or children with galactosemia ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Alternative
reviews.reviewText: My infant had a sensitive stomach since birth. I wasn't able to breast feed so formula was the route I took. I tried plant-based, soy and sensitivity formulas for weeks at a time, but my infant continued to have digestion issues. Went the "dairy allergy" route and came across this formula. I love that it PREPS the digestion system for dairy. This seemed to work well and the gassy and terrible poops balanced out. My infant was happier and definitely more comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for in the go
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for on the go traveling much easier then the cans which are 8oz and they don’t have a cover so you can only really use them at home. Really needed something for traveling so I got these they work great. And this is the only formula my baby can have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally! Happy Baby! Happy Mommy!
reviews.reviewText: I’m not a first time Mom. I have several children. I thought all my experience meant something, I thought wrong. My newborn was born in January. Soon as he was delivered at 37 weeks, he seemed so uncomfortable. The nurses noticed too and suggested in the hospital to put him on Enfamil gentlelease. So we continued it at home till we seen the pediatrician a few days later for weight check. He was having over 15 poops a day. He was also not resting at all and all red face from gas and crying. We couldn’t put him down. The pediatrician said it was a lactose allergy and to switch to Similac sensative as it had no lactose compared to the Enfamil gentlease. Well we did that for a month and my baby was still struggling.Would not sleep more then a half hour peacefully and it would be only in our arms. We were sleepless. I could not place him down at all in a swing or a bouncer before he wake up crying in pain. We were doing gas drops as well and he was still very unsettled. Waiting for his two month check up seemed so far away. So I went ahead and bought a case of this formula. Let me tell you that it was within 24 hours my baby complexion showed through. He wasn’t a red pepper after all. Within 48 hours we got a huge smile and coos. That was amazing. Within 36 hours he slept in his bassinet for three hours stretches the first time since he was born and not in my arms. He woke up just for feeds and went back down with ease. His reflux improved. No more projectile vomiting through his nose and mouth. No more choking and coughing. No more congestion fromThe milk. I have a happy baby now. One that more comfortable. No more walking around like a zombie, sleepless and trying everything you can read and purchase to sooth a colic baby. This stuff is liquid gold. It was our saving grace. I get to enjoy him more at this tiny stage. I get to be full functional with more rest and less stress. Do not hesitate to get it. Does it have a weird smell? .Well, we joke the baby smells like a potato but I will take that over covered in vomit and changing outfits and more crying changing him. Does it taste bad. I tasted it, it sweet at first then leaves a bitter after taste. It’s not that much different in taste then other Similacs.Does it work? It absolutely does! Is it worth the price? Yes it is compared to all the gas drops, gripe water, every bottle that swears to reduce gas and colic, bouncers, swings and carriers we purchased and who knows what else we would of gotten just to get some rest. It is so worth it. Happy baby makes for more bonding and more functional parents. A new baby will have you up at nights for feedings and changes but there a whole new ball game when it’s just what you expect. Compared to crying, unsettled, screaming in pain red faced. You feel hopeless when you can’t help your baby or take away their pain. Don’t hesitate to try it. It’s a saving grace.Update: I joined Similac rewards the coupons online have been pretty good and ordering as well directly from them you get 5 percent off when it’s not available here on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The first two weeks of my daughter’s life, she was very colicky. We couldn’t figure out what was wrong. She constantly wanted to eat, but would arch her back, squirm, and cry while nursing. Everyone said her constantly wanting to eat was normal, but I knew it wasn’t. She was so gassy and would spit up so much. It seemed to me like she was in pain, and eating soothed her pain for a moment, but then it would get so much worse after a few sips. When she would finish a feed, she would cry and arch until the next time.She started having really strange looking poop - green or black in color and very wet. Our pediatrician said that she probably has a dairy allergy, which made so much sense. She gave us a sample of Alimentum, and that night she immediately became a different baby. She was full and content, no longer arching her back or constant gas. She ate her bottle and fell asleep immediately, like she was finally at peace enough to sleep well.At first, I was very against using formula during her first year. I desperately wanted to breastfeed, both for her nutrition and to bond with her. I had to let that go, which was very difficult for me. Giving her Alimentum was one of the best decisions we made in the beginning, and it didn’t hinder my ability to bond with her whatsoever. If anything, it helped our bond because I wasn’t as exhausted as the first few weeks. My partner is grateful as well, as she was able to give her a bottle and bond with her more than she was when I was breastfeeding. Not to mention that she was a happier baby as a result. We just want the best for her, and clearly the best was Alimentum.We have used this formula for the past twelve months, and she has been a happy, well-fed baby. She is in the 85 percentile for weight and height, when before she was losing weight. We were worried about the reviews saying that it tasted and smelled bad, which is true, but it didn't affect her at all. She loves her bottles and doesn't mind the taste whatsoever.We started with the powder version, but we found the liquid far more convenient. It is worth the extra cost, plus the powder version is harder to find. We use Subscribe and Save, and get 15% off. There is nowhere you can find it for a better price. Buying the formula on Amazon has saved us hundreds.I cannot say enough good things about this formula. It saved us in her colicky newborn stage, and it has helped her thrive into toddlerhood. Even though using formula wasn’t what we had wanted, it wound up being far better than anything we could have imagined.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just want to say thank you for delivering this formula to my great grandson so quickly. It's one of the few things I can do to help my great grandson to grow healthy and strong. I live far away from him, so this fast delivery service is fantastic!!
